Articles.Content:
My normal fps was in 0.90 was 40-50fps whitout mods and whit mods 30-40 but in 1.0 Whitout mods my fps is under 20fps and whit mods 10fps! (and there is less mods than in 0.90) all my options is so slowas possible. So are here CFG file editing fps boost or mods wich disable more thinks and improvise fps?

P.S. I soon get new pc wich is not laptop so it should be fixed after that ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

This happened to me also, to fix it i just deleted my config file and then put the settings back to how i wanted it and my frame rate went back to normal, in fact better than previous versions.

The file should be inside your KSP folder and is called settings. Delete it then start up KSP again and it will re-create it.
Hi SolidJuho please see the support stickies and post your game logs ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
